name: Epic Track: Open World Extreme Racing
name_original: Epic Track: Open World Extreme Racing
description:
Epic Track : the next generation in 3D mobile racing games.

The wait is over, Epic Track is finally here! Speed around the city, drift on the snow, jump high over the off-road mountain terrain.

The developers at Go Motion games present to you a true open world 3D racing game with realistic drift and car racing physics.

3 Massive Levels to drive around including:
--Golden City
--Snowy Airport
--Grand Stones Off-Road Park

Real time weather changes as you play.

High Detailed tunnels connect the sections of the map

Jam Packed with Epic Challenges including:

--Jet vs. Car Challenge
--Extreme Parkour Missions
--Head to Head Racing
--Epic Jumps through Fire
--Stunt missions with double loops
--Hidden Packages to unlock Bonus Vehicles
--Drag Race competitions
--Roof Jumping
--Did I mention you get to jump through fire?

You earn money by jumping, drifting, and completing extreme challenges. Use the money to customize your vehicle or purchase new vehicles.

Loaded with all your favorite vehicles including across Five categories:
--Hatchbacks
--Supercars
--Trucks
--Hummer SUV's
--Jeeps
--F1 Racer
--Hover Car, yes, that's right. An actual Hover Car (Called Gigawatt)
--Even a monster truck and a 6 Wheel SUV

Customize your favorite ride at the Paint Shop

Multiple camera angles including a dashboard view.

Epic music tracks and sound effects. Hear that V8 Engine Roar.

Watch our for the Airplane Traffic at the airport - major damage control.

The game combines all the fun elements you find in a 3D Open World Free Roam style game with the challenge races you find in the top racing games.

Game Center achievements allow you to see how well you stack up against your friends. Its not quite multiplayer, but its as close as we can get for now. We are working on more multiplayer features, so stay tuned for updates.

If you need a High Octane, Fast Paced, Free Roam Simulator game - look no further. If low quality games make you furious, don't worry. This will not disappoint. Did I mention you get to race a jet?

Email your suggestions to gogomomogames@gmail.com. We look forward to hearing from you. Your support is very much appreciated. Thanks for playing Epic Track!
